item.name: Fishing Boat Prow
item.desc:
A prow that can be attached to a fishing boat. It allows the boat to sail faster when equipped. 
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
All DP +30
- Mounts Usable: Fishing Boat
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Ferry Prow
item.desc:
A prow that can be attached to a Ferry, allowing it to sail faster.
When 3 or more set items are installed:
Movement Speed +2%

- Can be Installed on: Ferry

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).
